title: BRIEF-Yes Bank Says Files Complaint With Mumbai Police And Cyber Cell Regarding Fake News About The Bank
text:
BRIEF-Yes Bank Says Files Complaint With Mumbai Police And Cyber Cell Regarding Fake News About The Bank

Stock Markets 1 hour ago (Oct 06, 2019 15:53)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Yes Bank Says Files Complaint With Mumbai Police And Cyber Cell Regarding Fake News About The Bank Oct 6 (Reuters) - Yes Bank Ltd : * FILES COMPLAINT WITH MUMBAI POLICE AND CYBER CELL REGARDING SPREAD OF RUMORS AND FAKE NEWS ABOUT THE BANK * HAS REQUESTED AUTHORITIES TO FORM MULTI-DISCIPLINARY TEAM OF EXPERTS FOR DETECTING ORIGIN OF FAKE NEWS

BRIEF-Yes Bank Says Files Complaint With Mumbai Police And Cyber Cell Regarding Fake News About The Bank
description: BRIEF-Yes Bank Says Files Complaint With Mumbai Police And Cyber Cell Regarding Fake News About The Bank
